      static java.lang.String md5Sum(java.lang.String str)
      Method: md5Sum Purpose: calculate the MD5 in a way compatible with how the scour.net protocol encodes its passwords (incidentally, it also outputs a string identical to the md5sum unix command).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • md5Sum

        public static java.lang.String md5Sum(java.lang.String str)
        Method: md5Sum Purpose: calculate the MD5 in a way compatible with how the scour.net protocol encodes its passwords (incidentally, it also outputs a string identical to the md5sum unix command).
        Parameters:
        str - the String from which to calculate the sum
        Returns:
        the MD5 checksum

        limit - to stop at

      • getFileMD5Sum

        public static java.lang.String getFileMD5Sum(java.io.File f)
                                      throws java.io.IOException,
                                             MD5CryptException
        Method: getFileMD5Sum Purpose: get the MD5 sum of a file.
        Parameters:
        f - the file to read
        Returns:
        the MD5 sum string
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on IO error
        MD5CryptException - on getting MD5 MessageDigest instance
